author: tirupati.banerjee
title: help needed around trip to Kashid during Ganpati Festival '15
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Maharashtra » help needed around trip to Kashid during Ganpati Festival '15 help needed around trip to Kashid during Ganpati Festival '15 # 1 Hello IM ers, I am planning for a trip to Kashid beach of Konkan from Pune during Ganpati festival season. Since I will be going there in my personal car wanted to know that would it be wise to travel to the konkan region during ganpati season? I am worried about traffic congestion, road blockades, road diversion etc? How bigger these issues will be since I will be driving down there for the very first time. Suggestions needed.
